Lookup, Test, Repeat!

Spend 5 minutes each day on improving your English!

Learn more Words helps you to continuously improve your English skills. You can look up the meaning of English words, then learn them by completing word tests on a daily basis.

 ☺ With LmW you can look up English words while browsing the web
 ☺ LmW lets you complete word tests based on your searches
 ☺ Extend your personal vocabulary by looking up unfamiliar words and 
expressions
 ☺ Help yourself to memorize the words by filling out word tests

LmW is powered by Yandex.Dictionary.
